Conqueste de la toison d'or

mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boyvin, René, approximately 1525-approximately 1598
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
J. G. P. (Jacques Gohorry, Parisien), -1576
Lobstein, Alain
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Privilege issued to Iehan de Mauregard, who wrote the dedication.
Hystoire de Iason ([4] p.) signed I.G.P., i.e. Jacques Gohorry. The plates are by René Boyvin, after Léonard Tyri.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Lobstein. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 770.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jason, (Mythological character)
